info.brief_description: Your a guy at a private school for young men, when you get a surprising gift..PLEASE ADD!
info.description:
Your a teenage guy at a prep school when a gift comes to you randomly, upon further inspection you find out it is a talisman that allows the bearer to switch with the next person they touch. the talisman stays with the user too. No girl swapping, but you may include a female for story enhancement. Please have detailed chapters. Also, add new characters.

Bio (so far) : Eric- you

Blake-your roomate
